# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
  words = Base.split(text, " ")
  wrapped = ""
  current_width = 0
  for word in words
    if current_width + length(word) + 1 > text_width
      wrapped .= "\n"
      current_width = 0
    end
    wrapped .= word . " "
    current_width += length(word) + 1
  end
  return trim!(wrapped)
end

# Example
text = "This is a long string that needs to be wrapped."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)
```
